card.name: Hop Ear Squadron
card.text: (Quick Effect) During your opponent's Main Phase [Target 1 face-up monster you control]: Summon this card from your hand, if you do, immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Monster using only this card you control and that target.

card.name: Black Rose Dragon
card.text: (Summon) 1 Tuner + 1+ monsters. ¹ If this card is Synchro Summoned [R]: You can destroy all cards on the field. ² (1/Turn) [Banish 1 Plant monster from your GY, then target 1 Defense Position monster your opponent controls]: change its battle Position, if you do, its ATK becomes 0 until end of turn.

card.name: Book of Moon
card.text: [Target 1 face-up monster on the field]: change it to face-down Defense Position.

card.name: Bottomless Trap Hole
card.text: When your opponent summons a monster(s) with 150 or more ATK: Destroy that monster(s) with 150 or more ATK, if you do, banish it.

card.name: Charge of the Light Brigade
card.text: [W, Mill 3]: Add 1 Level 4 or lower "Lightsworn" monster from your Deck to your hand. (Send the top three cards of your Deck to your GY.)

card.name: Coral Dragon
card.text: (Summon) 1 Tuner + 1+ monsters ¹ (1/Turn) [Discard a card, then target 1 card your opponent controls]: Destroy it ² (1/Name) If this Synchro Summoned card is sent from the field to the GY: You can draw 1 card.

card.name: Lightsworn Dragonling
card.text: ¹ (1/Name) If you have a "Lightsworn" monster in your GY [W]: You can Summon this card from your hand. ² (1/Name) If this card is summoned: You can send 1 "Lightsworn" card from your Deck to the GY, except "Lightsworn Dragonling". ³ (1/Name) If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 Dragon monster with 300 ATK/260 DEF from your Deck to your hand.

card.name: Wulf, Lightsworn Beast
card.text: Can't be summoned without card effects. ¹ If this card is sent from your Deck to the GY: You must summon it.

card.name: Felis, Lightsworn Archer
card.text: Can't be summoned without card effects. ¹ If this card is sent from your Deck to the GY by a monster effect: You must summon it. ² [Tribute this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls]: Destroy it, then mill three cards.

card.name: Weiss, Lightsworn Archfiend
card.text: ¹ (1/Name) [Place 1 other "Lightsworn" card from your hand on top of the Deck]: Summon this card from your hand, then mill two cards. ² (1/Name) If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: [W, Target 1 "Lightsworn" monster in your GY, except "Weiss, Lightsworn Archfiend"]: Summon it.

card.name: Solar Recharge
card.text: [Discard 1 "Lightsworn" monster]: Draw 2 cards, then mill two cards. (Send the top two cards of your Deck to your GY.)

card.name: Lightsworn Aegis
card.text: ¹ (1/Turn) [W, Target face-up cards your opponent controls, up to the number of "Lightsworn" monsters you control]: negate their effects until end of turn. ² (1/Turn) If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: You can Set this card.

card.name: Minerva, the Exalted Lightsworn
card.text: (Summon) 2 Level 4 monsters ¹ (1/Name) [Detach 1 material]: Mill three cards, then draw cards equal to the number of "Lightsworn" cards sent to the GY by this effect. ² (1/Name) If this card is destroyed by battle, or an opponent's card effect: You can mill three cards, then you can destroy cards on the field up to the number of "Lightsworn" cards sent to the GY by this effect.

card.name: Minerva, the Athenian Lightsworn
card.text: (Summon) 1 Tuner + 1+ monsters "Lightsworn" monsters you control can't be banished by card effects. ¹ (1/Name) If this card is Synchro Summoned [W]: You can send "Lightsworn" monsters with different Types from your Deck to the GY, up to the number of "Lightsworn" monsters used as this card's material. ² (1/Name) [Banish up to 4 "Lightsworn" monsters from your GY]: Mill that many cards.

card.name: Punishment Dragon
card.text: Can't be summoned without card effects. Must be summoned (from your hand) by possessing 4 or more banished "Lightsworn" monsters with different names. ¹ (Quick Effect, 1/Turn) [Pay 100 LP]: Shuffle into the Decks, all cards in the GYs and all face-up banished cards, except "Lightsworn" monsters. ² (1/Turn) If your "Lightsworn" monster's effect is activated: You must mill four cards.

card.name: Michael, the Arch-Lightsworn
card.text:
(Summon) 1 Tuner + 1+ LIGHT monsters
¹ (Quick Effect, 1/Name): [W, Pay 150 LP, then target 1 card on the field]: banish it. ² If this card is destroyed [Target any number of other "Lightsworn" monsters in your GY]: Shuffle them into the Deck, if you do, you gain 30 LP for each returned card. ³ During each of your End Phases: You must mill three cards.

card.name: Minerva, Lightsworn Maiden
card.text: ¹ If this card is summoned [W]: You can add 1 LIGHT Dragon-Type monster from your Deck to your hand, whose Level is less than or equal to the total number of "Lightsworn" monsters with different names in your GY. ² If this card is sent from the hand or Deck to the GY: Mill a card. ³ During each of your End Phases: You must mill two cards.

card.name: Sky Striker Ace - Raye
card.text: ¹ (Quick Effect, 1/Name) [Tribute this card]: Summon 1 "Sky Striker Ace" monster from your Extra Deck using this card as material. ² (1/Name) While this card is in your GY, if a face-up "Sky Striker Ace" Xyz Monster you control is destroyed by battle, or leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect [B]: You can summon this card.

card.name: Sky Striker Mobilize - Engage!
card.text: If you control no monsters, or the only monster you control is an Xyz monster [G]: Add 1 "Sky Striker" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Sky Striker Mobilize - Engage!", then, if you have 3 or more Spells in your GY, you can draw 1 card.

card.name: Sky Striker Mecha - Widow Anchor
card.text: If you control no monsters, or the only monster you control is an Xyz monster [C, Target 1 face-up Effect Monster on the field]: Negate its effects until end of turn, then, if you have 3 or more Spells in your GY, you can take control of that monster until the End Phase.

card.name: Sky Striker Maneuver - Afterburners!
card.text: If you control no monsters, or the only monster you control is an Xyz monster [Target 1 face-up monster on the field]: destroy it, then, if you have 3 or more Spells in your GY, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field.

card.name: Sky Striker Mecha - Shark Cannon
card.text: If you control no monsters, or the only monster you control is an Xyz monster [Target 1 monster in your opponent's GY]: Banish it, or, if you have 3 or more Spells in your GY, you can summon that monster to your field instead, but it cannot attack.

card.name: Sky Striker Mobilize - Linkage!
card.text: If you control no monsters, or the only monster you control is an Xyz monster: You cannot summon monsters from the Extra Deck until end of turn after this card resolves, except "Sky Striker Ace" monsters, also send 1 other card you control to the GY, if you do, summon 1 "Sky Striker Ace" monster from your Extra Deck using this card as material, and if you have 1+ LIGHT and 1+ DARK "Sky Striker Ace" monsters on your field and/or in your GY, the summoned monster gains 100 ATK.

card.name: Sky Striker Ace - Roze
card.text: (1/Name) If an opponent's monster is destroyed by battle, or leaves the field because of your card effect, while this card is in your GY [W]: You can summon this card, then you can negate the effects of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, until end of turn.

card.name: Sky Striker Ace - Shizuku
card.text: (Summon) 1 non-WATER "Sky Striker Ace" monster Monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK/DEF for each Spell in your GY. ¹ (1/Turn) During the End Phase [Detach 1 material]: You can add 1 "Sky Striker" Spell from your Deck to your hand, with a name different from the cards in your GY. Summon only 1 "Sky Striker Ace - Shizuku" per turn.

card.name: Sky Striker Ace - Kagari
card.text: (Summon) 1 non-FIRE "Sky Striker Ace" monster Gains 100 ATK for each Spell in your GY. ¹ If this card is summoned [Detach 1 material, Target 1 "Sky Striker" Spell in your GY]: Add it to your hand. Summon only 1 "Sky Striker Ace - Kagari" per turn.

card.name: Sky Striker Ace - Hayate
card.text: (Summon) 1 non-WIND "Sky Striker Ace" monster This card can attack directly while it has material. ¹ After damage calculation, if this card battled: You can send 1 "Sky Striker" card from your Deck to the GY. Summon only 1 "Sky Striker Ace - Hayate" per turn.

card.name: Reinforcement of the Army
card.text: (1/Name) Add 1 Level 4 or lower Warrior monster from your Deck to your hand.

card.name: Raiden, Hand of the Lightsworn
card.text: ¹ (Quick Effect, 1/Name): If your opponent activates a monster effect on the field: You can summon this card from your hand, if you do, mill three cards. (Send the top three cards of your Deck to your GY.) ² During each of your End Phases: You must mill three cards.

card.name: Ryko, Lightsworn Hunter
card.text: ¹ [W] During the next Standby Phase after this card was sent from your Deck to the GY: Summon this card. ² [Tribute this card]: You can destroy 1 card on the field, also mill three cards. (Send the top three cards of your Deck to your GY.)

card.name: Plaguespreader Zombie
card.text: f this card is in your GY [Place 1 card from your hand on the top of the Deck]: Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field.

card.name: Foolish burial
card.text: (1/Name) Send 1 monster from your Deck to the GY.

card.name: Lumina, Twilightsworn Shaman
card.text: ¹ (1/Turn) [B, Banish 1 "Lightsworn" monster from your hand or GY, then target 1 of your banished "Lightsworn" monsters, except "Lumina, Twilightsworn Shaman"]: Summon it. ² (1/Turn) If your other "Lightsworn" monster's effect is activated: You must mill three cards.

card.name: Starliege Seyfert
card.text: ¹ (1/Name) [Send any number of Dragon monsters from your hand and/or face-up field to the GY]: Add 1 Dragon monster from your Deck to your hand, whose Level equals the total original Levels of those monsters sent to the GY. ² (1/Name) [Banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Level 8 LIGHT or DARK Dragon monster in your GY]: Add it to your hand.

card.name: Jain, Twilightsworn General
card.text: You may spend W as if it were B. ¹ (Quick Effect, 1/Name) If this card is in your GY [Banish 1 "Lightsworn" monster, then target 1 face-up monster on the field]: it loses ATK and DEF equal to the banished monster's Level x 300, until end of turn. ² (1/Turn) If your other "Lightsworn" monster's effect is activated: You must mill two cards.

card.name: Galaxy Cyclone
card.text: ¹ [Target 1 Set Spell/Trap on the field]: Destroy it. ² (1/Name) During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY [Banish this card from your GY, then target 1 face-up Spell/Trap on the field]: Destroy it.

card.name: Compulsory Evacuation Device
card.text: [Target 1 monster on the field]: return it to the hand. It can't be summoned without card effects this turn.

card.name: Golden Cloud Beast - Malong
card.text:
(Summon) 1 Tuner + 1+ monsters
¹ If this card is Summoned: You can increase or decrease its Level by 1. ² (1/Name) If this card is sent to the GY: [Target 1 face-up card your opponent controls]: Return it to the hand.

card.name: Bystial Dis Pater
card.text: (Summon) 1 Tuner + 1+ Dragon monsters ¹ (1/Name) [Target 1 banished LIGHT or DARK monster]: Summon it to your field. ² (Quick Effect, 1/Name) When your opponent activates a monster effect [B, Target 1 banished card]: shuffle it into the Deck, then if you shuffled it into your Deck, destroy that monster, or if you shuffled it into your opponent's Deck, negate that activated effect.

card.name: Condemned Witch
card.text: ¹ (1/Name) If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Forbidden" Quick-Play Spell from your Deck to your hand. ² (Quick Effect, 1/Name) During your opponent's Main Phase [B, Tribute this card]: Summon 1 Level 4 Fairy monster from your Deck, except "Condemned Witch".

card.name: Forbidden Chalice
card.text: [Target 1 face-up monster on the field]: Until end of turn, it gains 40 ATK, but its effects are negated.

card.name: Xyz Import
card.text: (1/Name) [Target 1 Xyz monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls] Attach that opponent's monster to your monster as material.

card.name: Xyz Reborn
card.text: [Target 1 Xyz Monster in your Graveyard]: Summon it, and if you do, attach this card to it as an Xyz Material.

card.name: Sky Striker Mecha Modules - Multirole
card.text: (1/Turn) During the End Phase: You can Set "Sky Striker" Spells with different names from your GY, up to the number of "Sky Striker" Spell Cards you activated this turn while this card was face-up on your field, but banish them when they leave the field.

card.name: Sky Striker Ace - Hornet Drones
card.text: If you control no monsters, or the only monster you control is an Xyz monster: Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Warrior/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0), and if you have 3 or more Spells in your GY when this effect resolves, the ATK/DEF become 150 instead.

card.name: Pillar of the Future - Cyanos
card.text: (This card is always treated as a "Sky Striker" card.) ¹ (1/Name) If this card is summoned [Tribute this card]: You can summon 1 "Sky Striker Ace - Roze" from your Deck or GY, also you cannot Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Machine monsters. ² (1/Name) [Banish this card from your GY]: Add 1 "Sky Striker Ace - Roze" from your GY or banishment to your hand.

card.name: Condemned Maiden
card.text: ¹ (Quick Effect 1/Name) If you opponent summons a monster(s): Summon this card from your hand. ² (1/Turn) During your opponent's turn, you can activate 1 Quick-Play Spell Card from your hand.

card.name: Number 101 Silent Honor ARK
card.text: (Summon) 2 Level 4 monsters ¹ (1/Name) [Detach 2 materials, then target 1 monster your opponent controls in face-up Attack Position] Attach it to this card as material. ² If this face-up card on the field would be destroyed or banished, you can detach 1 material instead.

card.name: Sky Striker Mecha - Eagle Booster
card.text: (1/Name) If you control no monsters, or the only monster you control is an Xyz monster: Refresh 1 of your mana cards, you can only spend it on card effects of Spell Cards this turn, then if you have 3 or more Spells in your GY, draw a card.

card.name: Sky Striker Ace - Azalea
card.text: (Quick Effect, 1/Name) During the Main Phase: [B, send this card from your hand or face-up field to the GY, then target 1 card on the field] Destroy it. This effect costs B less if you have 3 or less Spells in your GY.

card.name: Forbidden Lance
card.text: [Target 1 face-up monster on the field]: Until the end of this phase, it loses 80 ATK, but it unaffected by the effects of other activated effects.

card.name: Dark Hole
card.text: Destroy all monsters on the field. This effect costs (B) more if you control no monsters.
